Sarah Vaccari

I am a professor at Federal University of Viçosa. I earned my Ph.D. in Mathematics from Imecc / Unicamp, under the supervision of Régis Varão and Pouya Mehdipour. See resume ›

My research interests are Dynamical Systems, Ergodic Theory and Symbolic Dynamics. See papers ›

This summer (in Brazil), I'm teaching Measure and Integration, and Basic Mathematics. See all courses ›

Next month, I will be teaching the mini-course Introduction to Ergodic Theory at XVII Summer Workshop in Mathematics at UFV. See all events ›

My email is neemias.martins@ufv.br. If you want to talk about math or have questions, my door is always open in Room A-302 at DMA/CCE.
